title: [plotsquared]地皮道路无法丢东西
author: a1546376557
txt_content: 地皮道路没办法丢东西，地皮内部可以丢

replies.author: 安不生
replies.txt_content: 插件配置文件夹settings.yml文件内kill-road-items: 改为false

replies.author: a1546376557
replies.txt_content:
安不生 发表于 2020-2-14 05:27
插件配置文件夹settings.yml文件内kill-road-items: 改为false  # Kill mobs on roads
  kill-road-mobs: false
  # Kill items on roads
  kill-road-items: false
  # Kill vehicles on roads
  kill-road-vehicles: false复制代码
就是false

replies.author: 安不生
replies.txt_content:
a1546376557 发表于 2020-2-14 21:32
就是false
那可能插件的开发者。。脑回路比较清奇，false为启动呢，那改为true试试看
